name: Maintenance Report
about: Request or report maintenance/housekeeping tasks
title: "Maintenance: [Short description of the task]"
labels: maintenance
assignees: ''

---

## Maintenance Task Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task (e.g., dependency update, code refactor, cleanup).

## Impact
Explain the impact of this maintenance (e.g., performance improvements, reduced technical debt, security fixes).

## Expected Outcome
What will be the result after completing this maintenance?

## Additional Context
Add any other context, links, or details about the maintenance task here.
